feed.title: Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:07 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 03:54 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: N 21 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets near midnight. Risk of freezing rain near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:42 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:42 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening. Forecast issued 11:42 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:42 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
